Name: Griffith
Description: The Division of Griffith consists of part of the Brisbane City Council.
ProductsAndIndustry: The area is mostly residential with some food processing and light industry. It is also the location of the world famous Brisbane Cricket Ground known as The Gabba.
NameDerivation: Named in honour of Sir Samuel Walker Griffith QC, 1845-1920, for his involvement with Federation and the development of the Australian Constitutuion and who was the the first Chief Justice of the High Court of Australia (1903-19).

DemographicRating: Inner Metropolitan - situated in capital cities and consisting of well-established built-up suburbs
